?

Module reth_primitives::revm::env

source ·
Expand description

The env module provides utility methods for filling revm transaction and block environments.

It includes functions to fill transaction and block environments with relevant data, prepare the block and transaction environments for system contract calls, and recover the signer from Clique-formatted extra data in ethereum headers.

Enums§

  • CliqueSignerRecoveryError
    Error type for recovering Clique signer from a header.

Functions§

  • block_coinbase
    Return the coinbase address for the given header and chain spec.
  • fill_block_env
    Fill block environment from Block.
  • fill_block_env_with_coinbase
    Fill block environment with coinbase.
  • fill_tx_env
    Fill transaction environment from a Transaction and the given sender address.
  • fill_tx_env_with_beacon_root_contract_call
    Fill transaction environment with the EIP-4788 system contract message data.
  • fill_tx_env_with_recovered
    Fill transaction environment from TransactionSignedEcRecovered.
  • recover_header_signer
    Recover the account from signed header per clique consensus rules.
  • tx_env_with_recovered
    Returns a new TxEnv filled with the transaction’s data.
